column5: A great ready as always Bunk! Pretty damn funny! #prostaff #mustjoin.    Thanks for putting that together.

You just can't keep a Viking Warrior from landing a beauty blond Mermaid. You got me on that one. What's the best way to handle a blond as to not harm them when you handle her?  A great report Bunk and very refreshing, no same old same old from Bunk. Reading your early prose out load I swear I'm back visiting at Sydney Steel in the 80's. There was a transplanted Irishman at the plant who's favorite saying was " Me can't says fer sure but I heerd it." Classic.  I have always enjoyed your Winter pics. What camera are you using if I may ask Bunk?  Please see PM.  Thanks for the great read and see.  Johnny D

Been here before, but....  Got to a computer that would let me watch that.  Had seen it, still funny.  As someone who has targeted splake multiple times with zero success I tip my hat to you.  Splake are my nemesis.  You have no idea.  Funny but, I would go to this lake from time to time and probably a half dozen or more over the years.  Never a fish.  This fall I was kinda sorta guiding an American friend here for 4 days, take him to the lake so he can try for his first splake and of course... he bangs a 21.5 incher.  Catching a few this time around, that really is because of the backwoods trout knowledge my buddy Mike has.  He's "Pro" and always has been.  Noice one Bunk!  But thanking China...  wouldn't that be, as the Brits so adeptly put it...  taking the piss?!?!  Is that how they put it?  Didn't know.  But I could see those stuffy teapot, banger and mash munchers saying something like that.  What's the best way to handle a blond as to not harm them when you handle her?  I have always enjoyed your Winter pics. What camera are you using if I may ask Bunk?  Please see PM. Johnny D  Wondering if there's a punch-line a coming to handling blondes or, if you're asking John?  Camera most often used now is a Nikon D40X but, still use the Lumix plenty too.
I was told not to lip them. Can I say that here? That's pushing bad taste for sure. Both cameras are beautiful tools from what I read, You get what you pay for. Nice, but not in the budget
Where do you find the time to post anything on this site? LOL Enjoy your posts, thanks.
He's sitting in a remote community.. with no woman.. no booze and nothing else to do between his 12 hour shifts! lol
He's sitting in a remote community.. with no woman.. no booze and nothing else to do between his 12 hour shifts! lol Didn't he just catch a woman? I thought I saw that in one of his pictures!
She had to be released, she was in the slot??  Outta be good for some roe though?
He's sitting in a remote community.. with no woman.. no booze and nothing else to do between his 12 hour shifts! lol  BINGO!  Even when home, it's a long time between shifts. lol.  Like to stay busy.

#youaretheman  Had to read the first part a second time. Tons of good laughs had. No better way to prep myself for the nerds with knives than getting out with you pro staffing. lol  BTW all this talk about hash taggn has made me so hungry I'm hash taggn #hashbrowns
Great stuff, man! And that is a fine looking beard if I do say so myself.
Hahahaha, funny and great at the same time - awesome reports!
Good luck bud, and safe and speedy recoveries.  Thanks beard brother Clive.  Appreciated Joey. Thanks lovey.
A true classic Bunk style,
Best, report, today...???  Bunk your the man!!!

You need to change names from a handle to you real name so you can get your name out there, gain lots of followers, then start pimping lure lodges and gear.  Once all this happens, you will eventually get yourself in a few magazines.  This is the sure road to success these days.  It can't happen until you lose the handle though dude, you heard it here first!  I'm just going to step out and pick up some duct tape now!
great report  you have to know he mounted the one
Moosebunk is up there with solopaddler.  Sort of like OFC's own Gord Pyzer.  No idea who that Mike Borger is thats rips off solopaddler in some fishing mags??? That guy peeves me.
Hahaha, bunk you are a wordsmith if there ever was one, wonderful fun as always. If you ever have to give up fishing you could always write books?
Where's the Like button? Mind if I retweet this or add it to my blog?
The first report was freaking hilarious  Part II nice fishes
#friggenhilariousandnicefishtoooooo
Been here before, but....
Those Lanark area girls have always been catch and release Drew !
As always Bunk  I say no more
Always a great read. Thanks for sharing.
Great report as always Bunk with a little humour thrown in well done.  Cheers
there's nothing like a Bunk report, very cool!
Great report and some fantastic catches.  As someone who has targeted splake multiple times with zero success I tip my hat to you.
The "red bearded Norse god" rides again .... LOL
Bunk, did your wife see this report? Lol
Your sure your not a goofie newfie?  Had a great laugh bud.

you have to know he mounted the one  That one awesome laker Terry?  Is that the one you're thinking?  Those Lanark area girls have always been catch and release Drew !  Horny hick chick backwood bush broads brother Wayne... you know it.  Catch'em on Friday nights near town, release 'em Saturday mornings in a swamp some place.  Before hitting the backroads with a case and the 22 to do some serious "hoggin."  Bunk, did your wife see this report? Lol  Not the report... but she gave the one pic you've take a liking to... "a like" as well. lol.  And somebody might have even shared it too... or Twitted it off to somewheres.  Your sure your not a goofie newfie?  Mom's side got off the ship over that way... so maybe there's traces bud!   Check out my... #thanksdoods.
This report just made me a prolaugher.  Favourite part was finding the staff on the ice hahaha
Noice one Bunk!  But thanking China...  wouldn't that be, as the Brits so adeptly put it...  taking the piss?!?!
Thanks for the stories and fish candy Drew.
